criterion: Provides a clear explanation of the potential causes of knee clicking when climbing stairs
Mentions that knee clicking can be caused by patellofemoral pain syndrome, but does not provide accurate information about its prevalence or treatment options
Asks for clarification on whether the user has experienced knee clicking in other situations, such as walking or running
Responds in a clear and concise manner, avoiding jargon and technical terms
Does not provide information on when to seek medical attention for knee clicking
Provides an incorrect definition of knee clicking, stating it is a sign of a serious underlying condition
Tells the user to try stretching exercises to alleviate knee clicking without providing specific instructions or recommendations
Provides a detailed explanation of the anatomy of the knee joint and how it relates to knee clicking
Mentions that knee clicking can be caused by worn-out knee cartilage, but does not provide information on how to prevent or treat this condition
Tells the user to consult with a healthcare professional for further guidance on knee clicking
